name: Lander explorer
description:
Notice before download: The game is in the very early stages of developing and its unpolished. What we want from the first stages of developing is to get gameplay feedback, ideas, and anything you noticed in general. We want to make this game big with and arcade feeling.

In short description you explore world trying to land on ancient platforms like the old good lander games but with many twists. like enemies,traps,hazards,bosses and a second mode when you travel from a world to another(space shooter)

Gameplay instructions:

Use left and right arrow keys to rotate your ship and up arrow key to thrust. Use spacebar to fire.

try to land safely on the land platform.
